original_text: And many nations shall be joined to the Lord in that day, and shall be my people: and I will dwell in the midst of thee, and thou shalt know that the Lord of hosts hath sent me unto thee.
korean_text: 그 날에 많은 나라가 여호와께 속하여 내 백성이 될 것이요 나는 네 가운데에 머물리라 네가 만군의 여호와께서 나를 네게 보내신 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: And many nations shall be joined to the Lord
and I will dwell in the midst of thee
that the Lord of hosts hath sent me unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 만군의 주가 나를 너에게 보내셨다는 것을
